summary: A social communication app for chatting and video calling with friends
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly illustration of two people talking with speech bubbles in coral and mint green colors for the landing page hero section (hero-chat.dim_1200x600.png)
- Simple icon of a video camera in coral color for the video call button (video-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Icon of a chat bubble in mint green for the messaging feature (chat-icon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a user authentication system using Internet Identity to allow users to register and log in securely
Implement a friends list management system where users can add friends, view their friends list, and see online/offline status
Build a real-time text chat interface where users can send and receive text messages with their friends
Create a video calling interface with start call, end call, mute/unmute, and camera on/off controls for peer-to-peer video calls between friends

Design a modern, vibrant UI with a warm and friendly color scheme (using coral, mint green, and soft yellow accents) that emphasizes connection and communication, with rounded corners, subtle shadows, and playful typography to create an inviting social experience

new_feature_requests.summary: Store chat messages in the backend with sender, recipient, timestamp, and message content, and provide query methods to retrieve chat history between two users
Implement call signaling in the backend to manage video call sessions, including call invitations, acceptance, rejection, and session state tracking between users
